DOC.brief_summary: This extension study is being conducted to collect post-treatment safety information on patients who previously participated in the core clinical trial.
DOC.brief_title: Follow-Up Study of Patients Previously Treated With Pimecrolimus Tablets for Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.criteria: Consenting patients who participated in the core clinical trial
DOC.keyword: Safety, atopic dermatitis, adverse event, SAE, extension
